name: IpReferenced
brief:
Reference counting base class for SmartPtr management

Defines ReferencedObject - the base class that any object must inherit
from to be managed by SmartPtr<T>. Implements intrusive reference counting
where the count is stored in the object itself rather than externally.

Also defines Referencer pseudo-class used to track which SmartPtr
instances hold references (useful for debugging circular references).
see: IpSmartPtr.hpp for the SmartPtr template class
